動物用藥品名稱: 生化雞傳染性華氏囊炎不活化疫苗
效能(適應症): 雞：預防傳染性華氏囊炎。
成分: A FORMALDEHYDE INACTIVATED LUKERT STRAIN OF INFECTIOUS BURSALDISEASE VIRUS IN A WATER IN OIL EMULSION. WOULD BE NOT LESS THAN10^6 TCID50 PER ML.AQUEOUS PHASE(D.I. WATER ) 22%   OIL PHASE (WHITE MINERAL OIL) 68%BACTERIOSTATIC AGENT:GENTAMICIN   0.003%            MERTHIOLATE   0.02%
